title: product_clicked
description: This event is triggered whenever a visitor clicks on a product. The following properties are supported by this event

product_id.description: Contains the database ID of the product being viewed

sku.description: Contains the SKU of the product

category.description: Contains the category of the product

name.description: Contains the name of the product being viewed

brand.description: Contains the name of the brand associated with the product

variant.description: Contains the name of the variant associated with the product

price.description: Contains the price of the product being viewed

quantity.description: Contains the quantity of the product

coupon.description: Contains the coupon code associated with a product

position.description: Contains the position of the product in the product list

url.description: Contains the URL of the product page

image_url.description: Contains the image URL of the product
